net.marfgamer.jraknet.client.discovery

Class DiscoveryThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • net.marfgamer.jraknet.client.discovery.DiscoveryThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class DiscoveryThread
extends java.lang.Thread
    This class is a Thread that allows clients to discover servers on the local network without having to actually be started
    Author:
    MarfGamer

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class java.lang.Thread

        java.lang.Thread.State, java.lang.Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler

      Constructor and Description
      DiscoveryThread() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addClient(RakNetClient client)
      Adds a client to the discovery system so it can discover servers
      RakNetClient[] getClients()
      Returns the clients that are currently using the discovery system
      boolean isRunning()
      Returns whether or not the thread has already been started
      void removeClient(RakNetClient client)
      Removes a client from the discovery system so it will no longer discover servers
      Note: This method is normally called when a client is garbage collected
      void run() 
      void shutdown()
      Shuts down the discovery system

        Removes a client from the discovery system so it will no longer discover servers
        Note: This method is normally called when a client is garbage collected
